Comments.Message:
Your system cannot find the uicc.exe and rc.exe files.
Make sure you have installed Windows 7 SDK.

Also, if you run on 64bit OS, check this: http://windowsribbon.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=77456
